description:
Disclaimer

The classification is determined by your answers and is not tax or legal advice. By using this tool, you agree that Manulife is not providing you with advice.

If you have any questions whatsoever about your tax status, consult a professional advisor.

label: Are you incorporated in the United States of America (U.S.)?
Are you a Financial Institution?
description:
Examples include: 
- Depository Institutions regulated by U.S. authorities
- Custodial Institutions regulated by U.S. authorities 
- Specified Insurance Companies regulated by U.S. authorities

This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 

CRS - Financial Institution 

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Does your entity primarily trade financial assets (e.g. money instruments, foreign exchange, securities) or manage investment, either for yourself, your family, or for third party clients?
Is your entity'a gross income primarily attributable to investing, reinvesting, or trading in Financial Assets where your entity are managed by another financial institution?

description:
This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 

CRS - Professionally Managed Investment Entity, tax resident in a Non-Participating Jurisdiction under CRS

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form
CRS self-certification, and
CRS self-certification and U.S. IRS W9/W8 form (as applicable) of each controlling person

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Are you a governmental entity, international organization or central bank?

description:
This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 

CRS - Active Non-Financial Entity - Governmental entity, Central Bank or International Organization

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form, and
CRS self-certification 

For details of U.S. IRS tax forms, please refer to IRS website: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions.

label: Are you a corporate that is publicly traded or an affiliate of a publicly traded corporation?

description:
This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 

CRS - Active Non-Financial Entity - a publicly listed corporate or its affiliate

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Do you actively sell products and services to customers, the income of which accounts for more than half of your gross annual revenue?

description:
This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 

CRS - Active Non-Financial Entity - Others

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 

CRS - Passive Non-Financial Entity

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form
CRS self-certification, and
CRS self-certification and U.S. IRS W9/W8 form (as applicable) of each controlling person

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Are you a Trust/ Legal Arrangement?
Are you a Financial Institution?
description:
Examples include: 
- Regulated Depository Institution 
- Regulated Custodial Institution 
- Regulated Specified Insurance Company

label: Do you have a registered Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN)?
description: GIIN - A number issued by the U.S. IRS to a non-U.S. Financial Institution that is committed to FATCA compliance with the U.S. Regulations or local Intergovernmental Agreement (IGA).

This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 

FATCA - Participating Foreign Financial Institution
CRS - Financial Institution

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 

FATCA - Nonparticipating Foreign Financial Institution /Owner-documented Foreign Financial Institution
CRS - Financial Institution

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Does your entity primarily trade financial assets (e.g., money instruments, foreign exchange, securities) or manage investment, either for yourself, your family, or for third party clients?
Is your entity'a gross income primarily attributable to investing, reinvesting, or trading in Financial Assets where your entity are managed by another financial institution?
Do you have a registered Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN) or sponsored by a regulated FI with GIIN?
description: GIIN - A number issued by the U.S. IRS to a non-U.S. Financial Institution that is committed to FATCA compliance with the U.S. Regulations or local Intergovernmental Agreement (IGA).

label: Are you located in Common Reporting Standard (CRS) jurisdiction?
description:
Please refer to below link for CRS jurisdictions
http://www.oecd.org/tax/automatic-exchange/crs-implementation-and-assistance/

This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be:

CRS - Financial Institution

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions.

This recommendation is not a tax or legal advice, but based on the information provided you appear to be: 


FATCA - Participating Foreign Financial Institution
CRS - Professionally Managed Investment Entity, tax resident in a Non-Participating Jurisdiction under CRS

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form
CRS self-certification 
CRS self-certification and U.S. IRS W9/W8 form (as applicable) of each controlling person of this entity


Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions
